creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: wooden box with inscription on inside and outside of lid; wrapped in tissue; long wooden roller with decorative cut ends; pink and green fabric with cream accents; three lines of text on image; image of landscape with buildings in a valley on L and a pagoda on a mountain ledge to the R
inscription: 高東山林靜　魚龍澗水深　人存道心固　縱唱苦寒吟
markings: poem UR red seal: 无心 {mushin} [mushin #2]; poem LL red seals: 福田世耕 {Fukuda Seikō} [Fukuda Seikō #4], 静處 {seisho} [seisho #4]; LLC red seal: 拙居 {sekkyo}
signed: 古道人畫并題 {Kodōjin ga narabini dai} (painting and title by Kodōjin)
title: Summer landscape
